thread.section_title: The Wall Street Journal & Breaking News, Business, Financial and Economic News, World News and Video
thread.title: BlackRock to Sell Stake in Indian Joint Venture to DSP

author: Corinne Abrams
title: BlackRock to Sell Stake in Indian Joint Venture to DSP

organizations.name: dsp blackrock investment managers pvt. ltd.

text:
MUMBAI—BlackRock Inc., the world’s largest money manager, said Monday it has agreed to sell its stake in its Indian joint venture to its partner DSP Group Inc.
The company said the DSP BlackRock Investment Managers Pvt. Ltd. joint venture, between the Indian financial firm and U.S. money manager, would end with BlackRock selling its 40% stake to DSP Group.
